website_summaries.verdict: The U-shape design on this float tube makes it more comfortable and easy to move in the water.
pros: Includes a tough under layer that allows it to hold up for a long time
Back rest includes a storage area
Features storage pockets and built-in fish ruler
cons: Float tube is rated for only 225 pounds, which makes it impractical for many fishermen

customer_reviews.title: Mostly positive with only a couple nitpicks
customer_reviews.text: I'm coming off a very old inner tube style Caddis float tube. Almost everything is positive about this new tube. - love the ease of entry vs inner tube style - The U-shape allows for better paddling because your legs don't hit the tube - back support is great - Good quality tough material - Easy inflation Things I don't like are primarily because I think the U-tube should be longer: - not as much flotation in the front: - the lap mesh is very small and crowded - I tended to slip forward and had to periodically shift my butt back
customer_reviews.author: davidTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, weight and sturdiness of this inexpensive float tube. It has literally no built-in back support or back-up flotation, unfortunately. The fly-holding pad on the outside is attached only by velcro so blew away as soon as I hit the water. The seat was fine for me, but would be tight for someone broader in the beam. It's also difficult to put the bar in place to hold the sides apart. Once in place, it becomes challenging to move around, possibly leading to a safety hazard. Okay for someone practiced in float tubes, using it for short periods of time, and fishing on small ponds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Used it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this 2/3/16 through Amazon. Loved it. Used it. Kept it stored in my garage when not in use. Went down 7/14/16 to take it out and upper back seam had separated. I am 5-3/145, its not over inflated, not abused, cleaned and stored properly. Should not have had a seam just come apart. So far with 3 emails, multiple phone calls to just get a phone tree that goes no where, I cannot get Caddis to respond to my warranty inquiries. I have sent pictures of the damage. Poor customer service, poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Great for fishing.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I've tried this several times and have been happy with each use; I've used both in warm and cold water. Plenty of storage in pockets, supportive back rest, and well, it holds air. :) Only down fall is that it does not come with a storage bag...
customer_reviews.author: Connor England

customer_reviews.title: Best float tube you can get !
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 230 lb guy and it was great fishing on it. You can’t beat it for the price, it’s just as good as the $600 float tunes, I guarantee you that, can’t go wrong; Buy and enjoy as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Tube
customer_reviews.text: Great float tube. You sit high out of the water, and it is perfect for fly fishing.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyC09

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on the maiden voyage
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on the maiden voyage. Sat up plenty high to flycast. Sturdy construction and big enough for my full size behind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Thing is awesome got it to fly fish and I’ve done nothing but bass fish from it in small hidden lakes or places with no normal boat access
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, great quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this float tube more than me! No but really, he has no complaints, very sturdy, great quality. He says he has no complaints and it is the best thing I have ever bought in all my amazon shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to test. Love them.. Easy to hose down and clean. Seem tough and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CDB

customer_reviews.title: Love my new tube
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tube. As with all others, it's cumbersome to get into but once aboard, it's sweet! You sit high and don't slide down. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Wedel

customer_reviews.title: Nevada gold is the best. Second one I've gotten
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many float tubes. Nevada gold is the best. Second one I've gotten. First one wore out after 10 years of hard fishing. Best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: new float tube worked great. easy to fill easy to float caught lots of fish yahoo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE YOU BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE FORGIVE ME, I WROTE MY REVIEW PREMATURELY!! There is not even one sheet of instructions included with this FLOAT TUBE!! You figure it out because the MANUFACTURE IS NOT GOING TO HELP YOU!! MORE IMPORTANTLY, THERE IS AN INHERENT DESIGN FLAW IN THIS PRODUCT THAT COULD COST YOU YOUR LIFE!! ARE YOU A GOOD SWIMMER?? BY GOD. YOU BETTER BE OR YOU WILL DROWN!! BECAUSE I ALMOST DID AND I AM AN EXCELLENT SWIMMER!! The problem is with the front end adjustments of the seat in this float tube. THEY COME LOOSE AND DUMP THE PERSON JUST LIKE FLUSHING THE TOILET AND DOWN YOU GO BOY! HAPPY SWIMMING A**HOLE!! PLEASE PRINT THIS BECAUSE IT COULD SAVE LIVES!! HAPPY JACK
customer_reviews.author: happyjack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this tube. Great material. Better than others I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Flyguymann
